2190dff679a5374cc2aafbc61a693aa8.tmpl:
$(listen)

<VirtualHost $(host):$(port)>

	ServerName $(host)
	
	DocumentRoot /home/bolt/share/htdocs/showme/
	
	ErrorLog /home/bolt/logs/httpd/showme.error
	
	<Directory /home/bolt/share/htdocs/showme/>
	
        # rewrite engine
        RewriteEngine On
		
		# query
		RewriteRule ^query/?$		query.php [L,QSA]
	
	</Directory>

</VirtualHost>

654afdf89638d9052059774eb3bfe3f1.tmpl:
<VirtualHost $(host):$(port)>
	
	# servername
	ServerName  $(host)
	ServerAlias www.$(host)
	DocumentRoot /home/bolt/share/htdocs/hub/
	
	# there are plenty of erros
	ErrorLog  /home/bolt/logs/httpd/hub.error
	
	# director
	<Directory /home/bolt/share/htdocs/hub/>
		
		# follow symlinks
		Options FollowSymLinks
		
		# index
		DirectoryIndex index.html index.php
	
		# rewrite
		RewriteEngine On
	
	</Directory>
	
</VirtualHost>

2b3e111a69e3736ff763dfde5c067b6a.tmpl:
php_admin_value include_path ".:/usr/share/pear:/home/bolt/share/pear"



<Directory /home/bolt/share/htdocs/>
	
	# engine
	RewriteEngine On
        
    # router to framework
    RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME}     !^(.*).(jpg|gif|css|js|png|ico|php|htm|txt)$ [NC]     		
	
	# deafult rewrite rule
	RewriteRule ^(.*)$		index.php [L,QSA,E=boltPath:$1,PT]

</Directory>

2c1ce381b00a97a3a76da3b4b94b8f45.tmpl:
Listen $(port)

# name me
NameVirtualHost $(host):$(port)		

# virtual host
<VirtualHost $(host):$(port)>
	
	# server?
	ServerName $(host)
	
	# root 
	DocumentRoot /home/bolt/share/htdocs/

	# set our project name
	SetEnv boltProject "helens"

</VirtualHost>
